code: @Test public void testExample() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedBodiesReceived("<employee id=\"James\"><name><firstName>James</firstName>" + "<lastName>Strachan</lastName></name><location><city>London</city></location></employee>").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "<person user='James'><firstName>James</firstName>" + "<lastName>Strachan</lastName><city>London</city></person>").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
